Seal characters (1)

觭字的基本解释

觭
jī
角一俯一仰。
偏，偏向一边：“齐秦非复合也，必有觭重者矣。”
古通“奇”，单（与“偶”相对）：“天子觭日视朝。”

觭
qí
古通“奇”，奇怪：“二曰觭梦。”

觭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》去奇切，平支，溪。］
(1)角一俯一仰貌。
(2)引申为偏倚。
(3)通“奇”。单一，单独。
(4)通“奇”。数目不成双的，跟“偶”相反。参见“觭日”。
[②]［qí］
［《集韻》渠覊切，平支，羣。］
通“奇1”。
奇怪，怪异。参见“觭2夢”。

觭字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觭； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1143第31
【唐韻】去奇切【集韻】【韻會】丘奇切，?音?。【爾雅·釋畜】角一俯一仰，觭。【疏】牛角一低一仰者名觭，言傾欺也。　又【廣韻】墟彼切【集韻】【韻會】去倚切【正韻】墟里切，??上聲。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】?居宜切，音羈。得也。【周禮·春官】大卜掌三夢之灋，二曰觭夢。【註】言夢之所得，殷人作焉。鄭康成又讀羈上聲，與掎同。杜子春又讀如奇偉之奇，觭卽奇字。【集韻】或作畸。　又隻也。【前漢·五行志】晉敗秦師，匹馬觭輪無反者。【註】一隻之輪。【莊子·天下篇】以觭偶不仵之辭相應。【類篇】引莊子，又音羈去聲。

觭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
觭字的起名意思

暂无。

lonely
Basic explanation of words
lonely
jī
The angle is pitched and pitched.
Partially, leaning to one side: "Qi Qin is not a compound, there must be someone who is serious."
Gu Tong "odd", single (as opposed to "even"): "The emperor looks at the sun."
lonely
qí
Gu Tong is "odd", strange: "The second is the dream."
lonely
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" goes to Qiqie, Pingzhi, and Xi. ]
(1) The angle is down and the other is up.
(2) The extension is bias.
(3) Through "odd". Single, alone.
(4) Through "odd". If the number is not in pairs, it is the opposite of "even". See "Zhi Ri".
[②]［qí］
["Ji Yun" Qu Zhi cut, flat branch, group. ]
Pass "Odd 1".
Strange, weird. See "Zao 2 Dreams".
lonely
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觭; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1143 31
【Tang Yun】Go to Qiqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Churchiche, "Yin?". 【Erya·Shi Hu】The corners are pitched and raised. [Sparse] The name of the person who lowers the horns and raises them, speaks deceitfully.　[Guangyun] Xu Biqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Go to Yiqi [Zhengyun] Xiuliqie, ?? Shangsheng. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Living in a suitable place, sound restrained. Got it. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] The three dreams of the big palm palm, the second is the dream. [Note] The income of Yanmeng is made by the people of Yin. Zheng Kangcheng read Ji Shangsheng again, the same as Qiao. Du Zichun also read the words like Qiwei and Weiqi. 【Ji Yun】or mischievous.　 Again only. [Previous Han·Five Elements] The one who defeated the Qin Shi, and the horses are mirrorless. [Note] One wheel. [Zhuangzi·Tianxia Chapter] Corresponding with the words "Zou Ou Bu Ya". 【Classes】Introduce Zhuangzi, and then go to the sound.
